channel.title: Projects on Lily Tsai
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Lily Tsai

item.title: SDDR and Encounter-Based Networks
item.description:
The SDDR (Secure Device Discovery and Recognition) protocol allows secure Bluetooth encounters to be formed between devices and enables novel encounter-based social network applications. As part of this project, we implement the SDDR protocol in Android devices as an Android library and formalize the security properties and communication channels used by encounter-based applications.

Publications

  • EbN project page

item.title: STO: Software Transactional Objects
item.description:
STO is a Software Transactional Memory (STM) that improves performance by tracking abstract operations instead of memory words.

github

Publications

  • Senior Thesis on transactional data structures
  • EuroSys ‘16 Paper on the STO system itself
